title: Medium Armour Proficiency
content:
Armour Proficiency Information

Wearing Medium Armour will not impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls or prevent the casting of spells.

How to unlock Medium Armour Proficiency

Medium Armour Proficiency can be acquired by

Barbarian (Lvl 1) Cleric Lvl 1 Druid Lvl 1 College of Valour Lvl 3 Fighter Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Paladin Lvl 1 Githyanki Shield Dwarf Moderately Armoured Feat

Medium Armour Proficiency Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here
